N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 112.3 - Notice to customers

State Regulations

Every banking organization shall give notice to its
customers of the planned closing of a branch not less than 90 nor more than 180
days prior to the planned date of closing. Such notice shall be accomplished
by: (a) the posting of a notice in a
conspicuous place in the branch which is planned to be closed, and leaving such
notice in such branch for at least 90 days; and
(b) the inserting of a single notice in the
periodic account statement ordinarily mailed to each person who maintains a
banking relationship with such banking organization at the branch which is
planned to be closed. Notes
